Admire Qatari traditions and modern touches inspired by the areaâ€™s rich heritage as a pearl diving and fishing hub, then lose yourself in the bustling souqs nearby. Pamper yourself at the elegant Tivoli Spa before dining at any of the four world-class restaurants serving authentic Middle Eastern cuisine and international dishes.
